Package com.lopl.melody.settings

Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
com.lopl.melody.settings.SettingsManager
public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
This is the manager class for all Settings in all Guilds. A Singleton Design pattern is implemented. See getInstance() on how to instantiate this class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static SettingsManager INSTANCE
    Reference of the only instance.
    java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​GuildSettings> settings
    Map containing a guilds settings.

    Private constructor.

    static SettingsManager getInstance()

  • Field Details

    • INSTANCE

      private static SettingsManager INSTANCE
      Reference of the only instance.

    • settings

      public final java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​GuildSettings> settings
      Map containing a guilds settings. Stored with the id of the Guild as a long.

  • Constructor Details

    • SettingsManager

      private SettingsManager()
      Private constructor. Get a object of this class with getInstance()

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SettingsManager getInstance()
      Singleton instance getter method.

      Example: 

       SettingsManager settingsManager = SettingsManager.getInstance();
      Returns:
      the SettingsManager instance

    • settingsOf

      public static GuildSettings settingsOf​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
      Shortcut for getInstance().getGuildSettings(Guild)

      Example: 

       GuildSettings guildSettings = SettingsManager.settingsOf(guild);
      Parameters:
      guild - the Guild, providing the ID
      Returns:
      the GuildSettings object for the particular guild

    • getGuildSettings

      public GuildSettings getGuildSettings​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Guild guild)
      This will search the settings Map with the guilds ID for the settings of the guild. If there is no cached GuildSettings yet, a new GuildSetting is Loaded with the SettingLoader and saved in the map.
      Parameters:
      guild - the Guild, providing the ID
      Returns:
      the GuildSettings object for the particular guild
